mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cd_project
AND (create_by = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} OR (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cd_usergroup WHERE cd_usergroup.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and cd_usergroup.group_id = cd_project.group_id) > 0 )

SELECT
FROM cd_project
and status <> 'done' AND id in ( SELECT project.id FROM cd_project project WHERE (project.create_by = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} OR (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cd_usergroup u_group WHERE u_group.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and u_group.group_id = project.group_id) > 0 ) )
